verses.verse: It happened <S%H310>after<s%> these <S%H1697>things,<s%> that <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5254>tested<s%> <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H85>him,<s%> "Abraham!" He <S%H559>said,<s%> "Here I am."

He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3947>"Now<s%> take your <S%H1121>son,<s%> your <S%H3173>only<s%> <S%H1121>son,<s%> whom you <S%H157>love,<s%> even <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and go into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4179>Moriah.<s%> Offer <S%H5927>him<s%> there for a burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> on <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> which I will tell you <S%H559>of.<s%>"

<S%H85>Abraham<s%> rose <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and <S%H2280>saddled<s%> his <S%H2543>donkey,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> of his young <S%H5288>men<s%> with <S%H3327>him,<s%> and Isaac his <S%H1121>son.<s%> He <S%H1234>split<s%> the <S%H6086>wood<s%> for the burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> and rose <S%H6965>up,<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> to the <S%H4725>place<s%> of which <S%H430>God<s%> had told <S%H559>him.<s%>
On the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> far <S%H7350>off.<s%>

<S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his young <S%H5288>men,<s%> <S%H3427>"Stay<s%> here with the <S%H2543>donkey.<s%> The <S%H5288>boy<s%> and I will <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H3541>yonder.<s%> We will <S%H7812>worship,<s%> and come back to <S%H7725>you.<s%>"

<S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H6086>wood<s%> of the burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> and <S%H7760>laid<s%> it on <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> his <S%H1121>son.<s%> He <S%H3947>took<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand<s%> the <S%H784>fire<s%> and the <S%H3979>knife.<s%> They <S%H8147>both<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H3162>together.<s%>

<S%H3327>Isaac<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham<s%> his <S%H1>father,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "My <S%H1>father?<s%>" He <S%H559>said,<s%> "Here I <S%H1121>am,<s%> my son." He <S%H559>said,<s%> "Here is the <S%H784>fire<s%> and the <S%H6086>wood,<s%> but where is the <S%H7716>lamb<s%> for a burnt <S%H5930>offering?<s%>"

<S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H430>"God<s%> will <S%H7200>provide<s%> himself the <S%H7716>lamb<s%> for a burnt <S%H5930>offering,<s%> my <S%H1121>son.<s%>" So they <S%H8147>both<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H3162>together.<s%>

They <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H4725>place<s%> which <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H559>told<s%> him <S%H85>of.<s%> Abraham <S%H1129>built<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H6186>there,<s%> and laid the <S%H6086>wood<s%> in <S%H6186>order,<s%> <S%H6123>bound<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H7760>laid<s%> him on the <S%H4196>altar,<s%> <S%H4605>on<s%> the <S%H6086>wood.<s%>
<S%H85>Abraham<s%> stretched <S%H7971>out<s%> his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H3979>knife<s%> to <S%H7819>kill<s%> his <S%H1121>son.<s%>
The <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> to him out of the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H85>"Abraham,<s%> <S%H85>Abraham!<s%>" He <S%H559>said,<s%> "Here I am."

He <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7971>"Don't<s%> lay your <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H413>on<s%> the <S%H5288>boy,<s%> neither <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3972>anything<s%> to <S%H6258>him.<s%> For now I <S%H3045>know<s%> that you <S%H3373>fear<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> since you have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2820>withheld<s%> your <S%H3173>son,<s%> your only <S%H1121>son,<s%> from me."

<S%H85>Abraham<s%> lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and saw that <S%H310>behind<s%> him was a <S%H352>ram<s%> <S%H270>caught<s%> in the <S%H5442>thicket<s%> by his <S%H7161>horns.<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H352>ram,<s%> and offered him <S%H5927>up<s%> for a burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> <S%H8478>instead<s%> of his <S%H1121>son.<s%>

<S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of that <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H3070>Yahweh<s%> Will <S%H834>Provide.<s%> As it is <S%H559>said<s%> to this <S%H3117>day,<s%> "On <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> it will be <S%H7200>provided.<s%>"
The <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham<s%> a second <S%H8145>time<s%> out of the <S%H8064>sky,<s%>

and <S%H559>said,<s%> "I have <S%H7650>sworn<s%> by <S%H5002>myself,<s%> says <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H3282>because<s%> you have <S%H6213>done<s%> this <S%H1697>thing,<s%> and have <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2820>withheld<s%> your <S%H1121>son,<s%> your only <S%H3173>son,<s%>

that I will <S%H1288>bless<s%> you <S%H1288>greatly,<s%> and I will <S%H7235>multiply<s%> your <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H7235>greatly<s%> like the <S%H3556>stars<s%> of the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> and like the <S%H2344>sand<s%> which is on <S%H3220>the<s%> <S%H8193>seashore.<s%> Your <S%H2233>seed<s%> will <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of his <S%H341>enemies.<s%>
In your <S%H2233>seed<s%> will all the <S%H1471>nations<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> be <S%H1288>blessed,<s%> <S%H834>because<s%> you have <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> my <S%H6963>voice.<s%>"

So <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> to his young <S%H5288>men,<s%> and they rose <S%H6965>up<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> to <S%H884>Beersheba.<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%> lived at <S%H3427>Beersheba.<s%>

It happened <S%H310>after<s%> these <S%H1697>things,<s%> that it was <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4435>"Behold,<s%> Milcah, she also has <S%H3205>borne<s%> <S%H1121>children<s%> to your <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H5152>Nahor:<s%>
<S%H5780>Uz<s%> his <S%H1060>firstborn,<s%> <S%H938>Buz<s%> his <S%H251>brother,<s%> <S%H7055>Kemuel<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H758>Aram,<s%>
<S%H3777>Chesed,<s%> <S%H2375>Hazo,<s%> <S%H6394>Pildash,<s%> <S%H3044>Jidlaph,<s%> and <S%H1328>Bethuel.<s%>"

<S%H1328>Bethuel<s%> became the <S%H3205>father<s%> of <S%H7259>Rebekah.<s%> These <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H4435>Milcah<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> to <S%H5152>Nahor,<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%>'s <S%H251>brother.<s%>
His <S%H6370>concubine,<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H7208>Reumah,<s%> also <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H2875>Tebah,<s%> <S%H1514>Gaham,<s%> <S%H8477>Tahash,<s%> and <S%H4601>Maacah.<s%>
